mapper.update: UPDATE student SET name = #{name}, furigana = #{furigana}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, area = #{area}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE studentId = #{studentId}
UPDATE students_courses SET course_name = #{courseName}, student_course_status = #{studentCourseStatus} WHERE students_courses_id = #{studentsCoursesId}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY course_name) as courseId, course_name as courseName, NULL as description, TRUE as isActive FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM students_courses WHERE course_name IS NOT NULL AND course_name != '' ) as distinct_courses ORDER BY course_name
